about_the_game:
Operation Hardcore's original soundtrack, a blend of ambient and up-tempo tracks by independent electronic musician Adam McLellan AKA Snug.

Includes 18 tracks in MP3 format:

  • Main Menu
  • Intro
  • City
  • Alien Drone Scout
  • Vendor
  • Forest
  • Aqualar Slayer
  • Cave
  • Turrettis Syndromis (Drum & Boss 1)
  • Mountain / Skylar Slayer
  • The Ascent / Metamissilen
  • Infected Planet
  • Solis Krustaseo
  • Alien Ship
  • Turrettis Multiplexis (Drum & Boss 2)
  • Space / Spawner-majka
  • Advanced Training Simulator
  • Ending
